tweet:
Nowadays how many Hindus name their child Ram,Krishna,Radhe,Laxmi etc? I find it rare even in rural areas. 
To look modern we go for English names.

In their community even Rich/famous people don’t feel shy before naming their Child after barbarians like Taimur,Jehangir etc.

comments.tweet: @MrSinha_ I named my daughter ditya which means goddess laxmi
